name: Bling Bling Magic Z
description:
Take on the radio waves, new DJ!

Welcome to Radio Bling Bling Magic Z, where its happening all day and night! In order to cut costs, we've spared as much expenses with equipment, song selections and you, new DJ, will have to go on air for a whole 24 hours!

To keep your job, you have to make sure the ratings don't fall too low. You have to cater to the listeners, the government, and, of course, me! Your boss! Disappoint any one of us, and you'll probably lose more than just your job...

This was made by four designers for the Global Game Jam 2017! #ggj17

---

How To Play?

Use only mouse to play the game.

Credits

Dushanth Daniel Ray Mahendran
